content.icerik: Lashes seems like wearing a rain coat. The fight against water has been won by Ultra water proof Mascara. The big improvement of this ultra waterproof formula is based on the perfect balancing, between soft waxes and hard resins that are water proof. For dynamic, active and sporty women, even under the rain, this is a "must" in every beauty kit. It doesn't smudge and is easier to remove with mascara water proof eye make up remover.
